mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, a.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM member ORDER BY member_reg_date DESC ) a ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow} AND ROWNUM <= 10

SELECT EXTRACT(YEAR FROM MEMBER_REG_DATE) AS YEAR, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM MEMBER_REG_DATE) AS MONTH, EXTRACT(DAY FROM MEMBER_REG_DATE) AS DAY, COUNT(*) AS MEMBER_COUNT FROM MEMBER GROUP BY EXTRACT(YEAR FROM MEMBER_REG_DATE), EXTRACT(MONTH FROM MEMBER_REG_DATE), EXTRACT(DAY FROM MEMBER_REG_DATE) ORDER BY YEAR, MONTH, DAY

SELECT TRUNC(om.ORDER_DATE) AS ORDER_DAY, SUM(od.FINAL_PRICE) AS TOTAL_PRICE FROM order_member om JOIN order_detail od ON om.ID = od.ORDER_MEMBER_ID GROUP BY TRUNC(om.ORDER_DATE) ORDER BY TO_CHAR(TRUNC(om.ORDER_DATE), 'MONTH DD'), TRUNC(om.ORDER_DATE)
